conclusion: Car A enters from the lower-right and is aimed toward the row of small green and blue cubes.
Its path is clear of the yellow toy car and the orange/red cubes, so it never reaches those.
On impact A strikes the first green cube, knocking that cube forward and slightly deflecting to its left.
Because the cubes are light and loosely stacked, the impact absorbs most of Aâ€™s kinetic energy.
After the hit, A rolls only a short additional distance and stops beside the displaced green cube, just in front of the other blue-green pile.
A collides only with the front green cube of the blue/green block group, pushes that cube a little, then stops next to it at the edge of the pile.
